scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter from James Fenimore Cooper to Messrs. Carey, Lea, and Blanchard, Cooper discusses terms for stereotyping Homeward Boundand Home As Found. This item is found in James Franklin Beard's Letters and Journals of James Fenimore Cooper, Volume III, 336.
